verses.verse: And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

See <S%H7200><s%>, I have called <S%H7121><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%> Bezaleel <S%H1212><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uri <S%H221><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur <S%H2354><s%>, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>:

And I have filled <S%H4390><s%> him with the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, in wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, and in understanding <S%H8394><s%>, and in knowledge <S%H1847><s%>, and in all manner of workmanship <S%H4399><s%>,
To devise <S%H2803><s%> skillful works <S%H4284><s%>, to work <S%H6213><s%> in gold <S%H2091><s%>, and in silver <S%H3701><s%>, and in brass <S%H5178><s%>,
And in cutting <S%H2799><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%>, to set <S%H4390><s%> them <S%H2799><s%>, and in carving of timber <S%H6086><s%>, to work <S%H6213><s%> in all manner of workmanship <S%H4399><s%>.

And I <S%H5414><s%>, behold, I have given with him Aholiab <S%H171><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahisamach <S%H294><s%>, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>: and in the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of all that are wise <S%H2450><s%> hearted <S%H3820><s%> I have put <S%H5414><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, that they may make <S%H6213><s%> all that I have commanded you <S%H6680><s%>

The tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, and the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> that is thereupon <S%H3627><s%>, and all the furniture of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>,

And the table <S%H7979><s%> and his furniture <S%H3627><s%>, and the pure <S%H2889><s%> lampstand <S%H4501><s%> with all his furniture <S%H3627><s%>, and the altar <S%H4196><s%> of incense <S%H7004><s%>,
And the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> with all his furniture <S%H3627><s%>, and the basin <S%H3595><s%> and his foot <S%H3653><s%>,

And the cloths <S%H899><s%> of service <S%H8278><s%>, and the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, to minister in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office,

And the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> for the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H6680><s%>: according to all that I have commanded you shall they do <S%H6213><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> you also unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, truly <S%H389><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> you shall keep <S%H8104><s%>: for it is a sign <S%H226><s%> between me and you throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>; that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> that does sanctify you <S%H6942><s%>.

You shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> therefore <S%H6944><s%>; for it is holy unto you <S%H2490><s%>: every one that defiles it shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>: for whoever does <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%> in it that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> may work <S%H4399><s%> be done <S%H6213><s%>; but in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of rest <S%H7677><s%>, holy <S%H6944><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: whoever does <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%> in the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, he shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.

Why the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, to observe <S%H6213><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%>, for a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

It is a sign <S%H226><s%> between me and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: for in six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>, and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he rested <S%H7673><s%>, and was refreshed <S%H5314><s%>.

And he gave <S%H5414><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, when he had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of speaking <S%H1696><s%> with him upon mountain <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of testimony <S%H5715><s%>, tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>, written <S%H3789><s%> with the finger <S%H676><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.
